Class Pokemon

java.lang.Object
domain.Pokemon
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Pokemon extends Object implements Serializable

  • Constructor Details

    • Pokemon

      public Pokemon(String newName, int newLevel, int newPs, int newAttack, int newSpecialAttack, int newDefense, int newSpecialDefense, int newVelocity, PokemonType newPrincipalType, PokemonType newSecondaryType, int index)
      Constructor for creating a new Pokemon
      Parameters:
      newName - The name of the Pokemon
      newLevel - The level of the Pokemon
      newPs - The health points (PS) of the Pokemon
      newAttack - The attack stat of the Pokemon
      newSpecialAttack - The special attack stat of the Pokemon
      newDefense - The defense stat of the Pokemon
      newSpecialDefense - The special defense stat of the Pokemon
      newVelocity - The velocity stat of the Pokemon
      newPrincipalType - The primary type of the Pokemon
      newSecondaryType - The secondary type of the Pokemon (can be null)
      index - The Pokedex index number of the Pokemon

    • getPPByName

      public int getPPByName(String name) throws PoobkemonException
      Gets the PP (Power Points) of a specific movement by name
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the movement
      Returns:
      The PP value of the movement
      Throws:
      PoobkemonException - If the movement is not found

    • setMovements

      public void setMovements(Movement[] newMovements)
      Sets the movements for this Pokemon
      Parameters:
      newMovements - Array of Movement objects to assign to the Pokemon

      Adds a new movement to the Pokemon if valid
      Parameters:
      mov - The Movement to add
      Throws:
      PoobkemonException - If the movement already exists or is invalid for this Pokemon

    • revivedByItem

      public void revivedByItem(double recover) throws PoobkemonException
      Revives the Pokemon using an item with specified recovery percentage
      Parameters:
      recover - The percentage of max HP to recover (0.0 to 1.0)
      Throws:
      PoobkemonException - If the Pokemon is already alive or has already used a revive item

    • haveUsedReviveItem

      public boolean haveUsedReviveItem()
      Checks if the Pokemon has already used a revive item
      Returns:
      true if a revive item has been used, false otherwise

      Parameters:

      amount - The amount to increase the stat by

    • losePS

      public void losePS(double losePs)
      Reduces the Pokemon's health points by the specified amount If health reaches 0 or below, the Pokemon is knocked out
      Parameters:
      losePs - The amount of health points to lose

      Parameters:
      newAttack - The amount to decrease the attack by
      Throws:
      PoobkemonException - If the amount is negative or would reduce attack below 0

      target - The target Pokemon
      Throws:
      PoobkemonException - If the movement cannot be performed

    • useMovement

      public void useMovement(String movimiento, Pokemon target) throws PoobkemonException
      Uses a movement by name against a target Pokemon
      Parameters:
      movimiento - The name of the movement to use
      target - The target Pokemon
      Throws:
      PoobkemonException - If the movement is not found or cannot be performed
